title: Belt, possibly 1200–1300
medium:
Medium: wool
Technique: double cloth, intercrossing of warps only; warp selvages; tubular woven for weft
creditline: Gift of Anonymous Donor in memory of Alexander M. Bing
description: Belt of red wool with center panel in dark green and tan, geometric pattern. Sides of plain red are woven double. Brown cords at ends.

tombstone.epitaph:
Belt, possibly 1200–1300.
possibly 1200–1300. Medium: wool
Technique: double cloth, intercrossing of warps only; warp selvages; tubular woven for weft. Gift of Anonymous Donor in memory of Alexander M. Bing. 1962-27-11.
